column4: hi , after restore i see my screen stuck with some of the graphical elements visible but the unlock screen is not coming up ... anything i can do?

Hibernation is a continuing issue for linux as per a lack of support from computer manufacturers (It's known to be temperamental even in Windows) so I would have to simply recommend not using hibernate
Alternatively, look into your laptops hardware and see if there are patches/workarounds for your HW (HardWare)
